Draw(object, Vector2, Rectangle?, FSColor, float, Vector2, float)

Draws a font glyph texture at the specified position with the given rendering parameters.

public void Draw(object texture, Vector2 position, Rectangle? src, FSColor fsColor, float rotation, Vector2 scale, float depth)

Parameters

texture object

The texture object containing the glyph.

position Vector2

The screen position at which to render the texture.

src Rectangle?

An optional source rectangle within the texture to draw.

fsColor FSColor

The color to apply to the texture.

rotation float

The rotation to apply, in radians.

scale Vector2

The scaling factor to apply to the texture.

depth float

The depth value for draw ordering.
